changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Correction des remontées d'information p: Correction of information feedback for Téléinfo equipment
changelog.md.Correction pour éviter la duplication de: Correction to avoid duplication of equipment when upgrading the plugin from the multiclass version to monoclass
changelog.md.Merci à arnog23 pour l'aide: Thanks to arnog23 for the help
changelog.md.Correction passage ancien plugin à nouve: Correction transition from old plugin to new WES plugin

index.md.Plugin permettant d'utiliser le serveur: Plugin allowing to use the WES server of CartElectronics, in order to follow in particular its energy consumption
index.md.Après installation du plugin, il vous su: After installing the plugin, you just need to activate it
index.md.Pour configurer le plugin, vous devez to: To configure the plugin, you must first add the WES
index.md.Voici les paramètres à renseigner: Here are the parameters to enter
index.md.Nom du Wes qui sera affiché: Name of the Wes which will be displayed
index.md.il faut mettre \"general\" si c'est une: you have to put "general" if it's a wes configuration
index.md.laisser vide si vous n'avez pas changé c: leave blank if you have not changed this in the WES configuration
index.md.mettre le login du compte WES (à l'origi: put the login of the Wes account (originally it is "Admin
index.md.mettre le mot de passe du compte WES (a: put the password of the Wes account (originally it is "wes
index.md.Si vous voulez changer ces informations: If you want to change this information you must first go to the WES interface to modify it
index.md.Après avoir sauvegardé, vous obtiendrez: After saving, you will get a multitude of modules
index.md.il vous suffit alors d'activer ceux que: you just need to activate the ones you want
index.md.Les modules grisés ne sont pas surveillé: The grayed modules are not monitored by the plugin, they must be activated for that
index.md.Après l'initialisation du Plugin WES, vo: After initialization of the WES Plugin, you can click on the key (see below)
index.md.En cliquant sur cette clé une fenêtre mo: By clicking on this key a modal window is displayed
index.md.selectionnez les relais et les boutons s: select the desired relays and buttons, then validate
index.md.Des scénarios seront créés automatiqueme: Scenarios will be created automatically on the WES in order to receive real-time feedback from buttons and relays (for other feedback, go to the general plugin settings
